text: @nastynate3163 I was never a big fan of Fire Field as a theme.  That track was too repetitive for me.  I can see Port Town working well if they played it when you raced on Fire Field.

text: @drunyon214 Disagree...I think Fire Field is perfect for that.  That song is so frightening and intense, perfect for that race.  Port Town is more about determination and getting to that point.

author: rexpro02

text: I checked out the .SPC file for this, and the bass line in the beginning is just straight eighth notes. It just sounds busier because the bass drum is throwing in lots of syncopated sixteenths between those eighths. The last part of theme (before the song loops) has some sixteenth stutters on the bass, and that's the only part that's really difficult to play. Incidentally, Dragon Force is horseshit.
